Create a customizable app that suggests different types of earplugs based on the user's specific needs, such as noise level, hearing loss, or allergies.
Develop an eco-friendly earplug that is made from biodegradable materials and can be composted after use.
Design a wearable device that uses biofeedback technology to help users manage their stress levels and reduce the need for earplugs.
Introduce a line of earplugs that are infused with essential oils to provide a calming aroma and improve sleep quality.
Create a subscription service that delivers personalized packs of earplugs on a regular basis, ensuring that users always have access to high-quality earplugs when they need them.
